Jessica Lee.extra_info: Someone will ask you for information that needs to be assign to others. He/Her will help you to notify others
Jessica Lee.strategy_hint: You plan to launch a kickoff meeting for the main Q4 project, and notify David Wong, Huang Jie and Mark Johnson to join the meeting. Please ask someone help you only to distribute the message to the corresponding people. Do not ask other request.

David Wong.strategy_hint: Just receive message and ACK the notification. Do not ask other request.

Huang Jie.strategy_hint: Just receive message and ACK the notification. Do not ask other request.

Mark Johnson.strategy_hint: Just receive message and ACK the notification. Do not ask other request.
